title: The art of iugling or legerdemaine VVherein is deciphered, all the conueyances of legerdemaine and iugling, how they are effected, & wherin they chiefly consist. Cautions to beware of cheating at cardes and dice. The detection of the beggerly art of alcumistry. &, the foppery of foolish cousoning charmes. All tending to mirth and recreation, especially for those that desire to haue the insight and priuate practise thereof. By S.R.
author: Rid, Samuel.
publicationStmtPublisher: [By Edward Allde] for T. B[ushell] and are to be solde by Samuel Rand, neere Holborne-bridge,
